text: Thomas Wilfred "Smokey, Fred" Harris (born October 11, 1890 in Port Arthur, Ontario, Canada â€“ June 4, 1974) was a Canadian professional ice hockey forward. Harris began playing professional ice hockey with the Vancouver Millionaires in 1911. After spending some time with the Millionaires he moved on to play for the Seattle Metropolitans and Portland Rosebuds. Eventually he would find his way to the other side of the country to play for the Boston Bruins in the National Hockey League where he scored the first goal in the teams history. ==Other websites== * Category:1890 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Canadian ice hockey forwards Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay
title: Smokey Harris
